hibernate-mapping.sql-query: from Role role where 1 = 1 <if isNotBlank(systemUnitId)> and role.systemUnitId = :systemUnitId </if> <if isNotBlank(code) ||isNotBlank(name) || isNotBlank(remark) || isNotBlank(noCategory)> and (1 = 2 <if isNotBlank(code)> or lower(role.code) like '%${code?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(name)> or lower(role.name) like '%${name?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(remark)> or lower(role.remark) = lower(:remark) </if> <if isNotBlank(noCategory)> and role.categoryUuid is null </if> ) </if> order by ${orderBy}
